__e: Don't cry. It'll leave marks on your face
Well, apparently, in about three months, I can look forward to dark spots on my face, because it's not enough to just get fat.
Remember once you came home and found me with a swollen face?
But I wasn't sure if the marks on her neck were from bruises or livor mortis.
You think this has anything to do with those light flares we saw on the satellite photos?
The marks on her neck were not mentioned in the report.
That's for sure. He had a nicer face than you have, too!
What about those marks on her neck?
I've met someone else with marks on his hands like that.
I need to know what bruises form in the next 20 minutes.
What are your pants stained with?
And you can imagine the stains that he comes home with.
Her smile, the way she walks. Even the way she was bruised, while struggling against me...
I hope there won't be any stains on the carpet.
Oh. Speaking of stains, what is that?
Then why can't they get the stains out?
I used to lie awake at night upset because even though you couldn't see the stains I knew they were there.
